lines.text: Try here. Stop.
What the hell am I looking at? When does this happen in the movie?
Now. You're looking at now, sir. Everything that happens now, is happening now.
What happened to then?
We passed then.
When?
Just now. We're at now now.
Go back to then.
When?
Now.
Now?
Now.
I can't.
Why?
We missed it.
When?
Just now.
When will then be now?
Soon.
How soon?
Before you die there is something you should know about us, Lone Star.
What?
I am your father's brother's nephew's cousin's former roommate.
What's that make us?
Absolutely nothing! Which is what you are about to become.
Careful you idiot! I said across her nose, not up it!
Sorry sir! I'm doing my best!
Who made that man a gunner?
I did sir. He's my cousin.
Who is he?
He's an asshole sir.
I know that! What's his name?
That is his name sir. Asshole, Major Asshole!
And his cousin?
He's an asshole too sir. Gunner's mate First Class Philip Asshole!
How many assholes do we have on this ship, anyway?
[Entire bridge crew stands up and raises a hand]
Yo!
I knew it. I'm surrounded by assholes!
[Dark Helmet pulls his face shield down]
Keep firing, assholes!
[Lord Helmet is playing with his dolls in his quarters when Col Sandurz bursts in]
Lord Helmet!
WHAT?
[Helmet gathers up his dolls in the blink of an eye]
You're needed on the bridge sir!
Knock on my door! Knock next time!
Yes, sir!
Did you see anything?
No, sir! I didn't see you playing with your dolls again.
GOOD!
[Sandurz slams the door]
[playing with his dolls]

[in Dark Helmet voice]
So, Princess Vespa, at last I have you in my clutches, to have my way with you, the way I want to.
[in Vespa voice]
No, no, please leave me alone!

[in Dark Helmet voice]
No, you are mine!

[in Lone Starr voice]
Not so fast, Helmet!

[in Dark Helmet voice]
Lone Starr!

[in Lone Starr voice]
Yes, its me. I'm here to save my girlfriend. Hi, honey.

[in Dark Helmet voice]
Now you are going to die! Pfffsh!

[in Lone Starr voice]
Oh, oh... OH!

[in Barf voice]
Hey, what did you do to my friend?

[in Dark Helmet voice]
The same thing I'm going to do to you, big boy!

[in Barf voice]
OH! OH!

[in Dark Helmet voice]
And you too!

[in Dot voice]
Owww! Ah!

[in Dark Helmet voice]
Now Princess Vespa, at last we are alone.

[in Vespa voice]
Oh, oh, I hate you I hate you I hate you leave me alone! - yet, I find you strangely attractive.

[in Dark Helmet voice]
Of course you do. Druish princesses are often attracted to money, and power, and I have BOTH, and YOU KNOW IT!

[in Vespa voice]
Oh, oh, leave me alone!

[in Dark Helmet voice]
No, kiss me!
[cuts between their voices]
Oh, oh, no, yes, no, NO, yes, ah, ah, ah ahhhhh... oh, your helmet is so big...

[as the Spaceballs and what is left of Mega Maid land on the Planet of the Apes]
Dear me. What are these things coming out of her nose?

[One of the apes takes his binoculars out and sees Colonel Sandurz, Dark Helmet, and President Skroob coming out of Mega Maid's nose]
Hey, hey, hey. Watch my Helmet.
Spaceballs.
Oh, shit. There goes the planet.

[alien rips out of his stomach. He looks down at it]
Oh, no. Not again.
What's the matter, Colonel Sandurz? CHICKEN?
The Movie video cassette]
No, no, no. Go past this. Pass this part. In fact, never play this again.

[appearing in the room, lifting up his visor]
I can't breathe in this thing.
We're approaching Planet Druidia, sir.
Good. I'll call Spaceball City and notify President Skroob immediately.
I already called him, sir. He knows everything.
What? You went over my helmet?
Well not exactly over, sir... more to the side - I'll always call you first, it will never happen again, never, ever.
[Helmet gets out his Schwartz ring]
Oh, shit. No, no, no. No, please, please, no.
[covering his neck]
Not that.

[lowers his visor]
Yes, that.
[aims the beam at the operator's crotch, as the operator agonizes in pain]

[after finding that the 'Self Destruct Cancellation' button has yet to be installed]
Out of order? Fuck! Even in the future nothing works!

Merchandising, merchandising, where the real money from the movie is made. Spaceballs-the T-shirt, Spaceballs-the Coloring Book, Spaceballs-the Lunch box, Spaceballs-the Breakfast Cereal, Spaceballs-the Flame Thrower.
[turns it on]
Ooooh!

[reacts to dinks]
The kids love this one.
[a dink hands him a doll that looks likes Yogurt]
And last but not least, Spaceballs the doll, me.
[pulls string]
May the schwartz be with you!

[kisses the doll]
Adorable.
[King Roland has given in to Dark Helmet's threats, and is telling him the combination to the "air shield"]
One.
One.
One.
Two.
Two.
Two.
Three.
Three.
Three.
Four.
Four.
Four.
Five.
Five.
Five.
So the combination is... one, two, three, four, five? That's the stupidest combination I've ever heard in my life! That's the kind of thing an idiot would have on his luggage!
What the hell was that noise?
That was my virgin-alarm. It's programmed to go off before you do!
You idiots! These are not them! You've captured their stunt doubles!
I know we need the money, but...
Listen! We're not just doing this for money!
[Barf looks at him, raises his ears]
We're doing it for a SHIT LOAD of money!
[Princess Vespa has been given a gun]
I ain't shooting this thing, I hate guns.
[her hair gets singed by a laser]
My hair, he shot my hair. Son of a bitch!
[begins blasting]
Who hasn't heard of Yogurt!
Yogurt the Wise!
Yogurt the All-Powerful!
Yogurt the Magnificent!
Please, please, don't make a fuss. I'm just plain Yogurt.

[Spaceball 1 roars by them, in a plaid colouration of speed]
Aah!
What the hell was that?
Spaceball 1.
They've gone to plaid!

[after tearing the microphone out of the desk]
Now what is it?
I'm having trouble with the radar, sir.
What's wrong with it?
I've lost the bleeps, I've lost the sweeps, and I've lost the creeps.
The what?
The what?
And the what?
You know. The bleeps.
[makes bleep sound effect, making a ripple motion with his fingers]
The sweeps.
[makes sweep sound. Quivers his face while doing it]
And the creeps.
[makes creep sound, making little movements with his fingers]

[to Colonel Sandurz]
That's not all he's lost.
[as they are trekking through the desert]
Water. Water.
[Barf is panting with his tongue hanging out]
Oil. Oil.
Room service. Room service.
What the hell are you doing?
The Vulcan neck pinch?
No, no, no, stupid, you've got it much too high. It's down here where the shoulder meets the neck.
[Lone Star changes hand position]
Like this?
Yeah!
[guard falls to the ground]
Thanks.

[looking at Mr. Coffee]
What's the matter with this thing, what's all that churnning and bubbling, you call that radar screen?
No, sir. We call it,
[slaps the machine]
Mr Coffee. Care for some?
[prepairs a cup for Helmet]
Yes. I always have my coffee when I watch radar, you know that.
Of course I do, sir.

[to everybody]
Everybody knows that!

[covering their crotches]
Of course we do, sir.
Now listen you...
You listen. On this ship, you're to refer to me as 'idiot', not 'you captain'. I mean, you know what I mean.
And you will not call me 'you'. You will never address me as 'you'. You will call me 'your royal highness'.
You are royal pain in the...
Whoa, hold it, time.
[upon going into "ludicrous speed"]
My brains are going into my feet!
Do you?
Yes
Do you?
Yes
GOOD, you're married. KISS HER!
[after running the full length of Spaceball One to reach the bridge]
The ship is too big. If I walk, the movie will be over.

[breathes heavily, Darth Vader-style]
I can't breathe in this thing!
I wonder, will we ever see each other again?
The Search for More Money.

[squeaks]
Prepare ship...
[tries again, with booming voice]
Prepare ship for ludicrous speed! Fasten all seatbelts, seal all entrances and exits, close all shops in the mall, cancel the three ring circus, secure all animals in the zoo!

[after Helmet went flying and crashed into the computers after Spaceball 1 stops]
Are you alright sir?

[in a stupor]
Fine. How've you been?
Fine sir.

[softly]
Good
It's a good thing you were wearing that helmet.

[barely audible]
Yeah.
What shall we do now, Sir?
Well, are we stopped?
We're stopped, Sir.
Good. Well why don't we take a five minute break?
Very good, Sir.
Smoke if you got'em.
[Collapses]
So, Lone Star, now you see that evil will always triumph because good is dumb.

[in reference to not wanting to attack Yogurt's lair]
But sir, your ring! Don't you have the schwartz too?
Nah, he got the upside, I got the downside. See there's two sides to every Schwartz.
Say goodbye to your two best friends, and I don't mean your pals in the Winnebago.
Excuse me! I'm trying to conduct a wedding here which has nothing to do with love, so please be quiet!
I'm sorry!
I'm sorry
I'm sorry too.
Don't be sorry, be quiet!
I'm sorry!
[last lines]

[seeing Lone Starr and Princess Vespa kiss at their wedding]
Well, goodbye virgin alarm.
[first title cards]
Once upon a time warp...

In a galaxy very, very, very, very far away there lived a ruthless race of beings known as... Spaceballs. Chapter Eleven. The evil leaders of planet Spaceball, having foolishly squandered their precious atmosphere, have devised a secret plan to take every breath of air from their peace-loving neighbor, Planet Druidia. Today is Princess Vespa's wedding day. Unbeknownst to the Princess but knownst to us, danger lurks in the stars above... If you can read this, you don't need glasses.
I am Princess Vespa, daughter of Roland, King of the Druids.
Oh great. That's all we needed. A Druish princess.
Funny, she doesn't look Druish.
Why didn't somebody tell me my ass was so big?
Are we being too literal?
No you fool, we're following orders. We were told to comb the desert so we're combing it.
[the quartet enters Yogurt's lair]
What is this place?
It looks like the Temple of Doom.
Well it sure ain't Temple Beth Israel.
What did you do?
I turned off the wall.
No, you didnt! You turned off the whole movie!
I must have pressed the wrong button.
Well, put it back on!
Sanders! Sanders! You gotta help me, I don't know what to do. I can't make decisions, I'm a president!
Can we talk? OK, we all know Prince Valium is a pill. But you could have married him for your father's sake and had a headache for the next 25 years.
We gotta get moving before dawn.
Why so early?
Because we're in the middle of a desert and we're not going to get very far once that blazing sun gets overhead.
[screen dissolves into a shot of the blazing sun overhead, with Lone Starr and Barf still slightly visible]
Nice dissolve.
half man, half dog. I'm my own best friend!
You have the ring, and I see your Schwartz is as big as mine. Now let's see how well you handle it.
[Mega-Maid's computer counts down to self-destruct]
Ten... nine... eight... six...
Six? What happened to seven?
Just kidding!
[They growl in annoyance]

[Skroob, Sandurz, and Helmet are mouthing the numbers alone with the recording]
Six... five... four... three... two... one...
[they close their eyes and grimace]
Have a nice day.

[open their eyes]
Thank you.
[They close them again]
Who are you?
Barf!
Not in here, mister! This is a Mercedes!
[man who ate the Space Special is becoming violently ill]
Grab him some water!
Water, my ass! Bring this guy some Pepto-Bismol!
Did I miss something? When did we get to Disneyland?
Sir hadn't you better buckle up?
Ah, buckle this! LUDICROUS SPEED! *GO!*
Hello, President Skroob.

[to Marlene]
Hello, Charlene.
I'm Marlene.

[to Charlene]
Hello, Marlene.
I'm Charlene.
Chew your gum.

[to Dark Helmet]
Never have that damn thing down in front of me. How I do I know you're not making faces at me under that thing?
[Dark Helmet raises his face shield and sticks his tongue out at Skroob after he turns away]
This ship will self-destruct in twenty seconds. This is your last chance to push the cancellation button.
Cancellation button? HURRY!
Did it work? Where's the king?
It worked, sir. We have the combination.
Great. Now we can take every last breath of fresh air from Planet Druidia. What's the combination?
Yes!
That's amazing. I've got the same combination on my luggage.
[looks at each other]

[Upon discovering there is only one escape pod left]
One pod left and three of us and I'm the President. Well, boys, it's a very lovely ship. I think you should go down with it.
[nurse exits]
I bet she gives great helmet.
The minute we move in they're gonna spot us on their radar.
Nuh-uh.
Uh-huh.
Nuh-uh.
Uh-uh.
Nuh-uh. Not if we jam it.
Aha! You're right.
Down scope.
Down scope.
[puts down a periscope and targets the Spaceball 1's radar dish]
Radar about to be "jammed."
[then, a huge jar of "jam" smashes into the dish]
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here today to witness Princess Vespa, daughter of King Roland going right past the altar, heading down the ramp and out the door!
It's Mega Maid. She's gone from suck to blow.
What's your name?
Barf.
Your full name?
[Barf sucks in chest to look stronger]
Barfolomew!
(reacting to the guards being shot by Princess Vespa) HOLY SHIT!
How was that?
Not bad.
Not bad... for a girl.
Hey that was pretty good for RAMBO!
We ain't found shit!
[after attempting to get out of a chair with his seatbelt on]
Oh! That's gonna leave a mark.
[after the self-destruction mechanism has been activated]
Sandurz, Sandurz. You got to help me. I don't know what to do. I can't make decisions. I'm a president!
Prepare ship for light speed.
No, no, no, light speed is too slow.
Light speed, too slow?
Yes, we're gonna have to go right to ludicrous speed.
Prepare to attack! On the count of three. One... two...
[Eagle 5 suddenly blasts out of sight]
WAIT! What happened? Where are they?

[worried]
I don't know sir! They must have hyperjets on that thing.
AND WHAT HAVE WE GOT ON THIS THING, A *CUISINART*?
Shall I have Snotty beam you down, sir?
I don't know about this beaming stuff? Is it safe?
Oh yes, sir. Snotty beamed me twice last night. It was wonderful.
Thank you for pressing the self-destruct button. This ship will self-destruct in exactly two minutes and forty-five seconds.
You've got to stop it. Is there any way to stop it?
I can't - it's irreversible.
Like my raincoat!

[while running from blaster fire, a la Star Wars]
"Ooh, I *hate* these movies!
Hey! Those are the guys that stole our uniforms!
They beat the shit out of us too!
Chief... I can't... I can't go any further. I can't go any further.
Just one more dune to go.
That's what you said three dunes ago. I got no more left. Oh, waiter... cheque please.
[collapses, dropping Dot]
Must go on... MUST GO ON! Must go on...
[stops]
Who am I kidding?
[Drops Vespa, collapses]

[as the ship is going into ludicrous speed]
We've passed them. Stop this thing!
We can't stop, it's too dangerous! We have to slow down first!
BULLSHIT! Just stop this thing! I order you, *STOP*!
[after their Schwartz sabers get twisted]
Shit! I hate it when I get my Schwartz twisted.

[Helmet is going to enter an escape pod when a fat woman reaches it first]
Hey hey hey! That's my escape pod! Who are you?

[in gravelly voice]
I'm the bearded lady! Who are you, one of the freaks?
[bumps Helmet away, boards the escape pod laughing]

[Helmet up at the window]
Wait, wait! No!
[escape pod blasts away]
Come back you fat bearded bitch!

[Skroob is going to the bathroom. Zircon appears on the wall in front of him]
President Skroob!
Ahh! I told you never to call me on this wall! This is an unlisted wall!

[Into raspy-sounding intercom]
Sir?
What is it?
Can I talk to you for a minute, please, sir?

[Dark Helmet and Colonel Sandurz approach the Radar Technician]
Well?

[Into the intercomm]
I'm having trouble with the radar, sir.

[Putting the intercomm microphone back]
You don't need that, private; we're right here. Now, what is it?

[Raspy-sounding intercomm voice]
I'm having trouble with the radar, sir.

[Tears the microphone out of the deck and throws it aside]
Now, what is it?
Use the Schwartz, Lone Starr! Use the Schwartz!
I can't - I lost the ring!
Forget the ring! The ring is bupkis! I found it in a Cracker Jack box!
Hey, hey, hey! That's my escape pod! Who are you?
I'm the Bearded Lady. Who are you, one of the freaks?

[the Bearded Lady belly bumps Dark Helmet out of the way and takes the escape pod]
Dammit! That's my pod! No! Come back you fat, bearded bitch!
[as Lone Starr dodges laser blasts from Dark Helmet's Schwartz]
Very impressive, Lone Starr. Too bad this isn't the Wild World of Sports.

[singing and dancing]
Hello my baby, hello my honey, hello my ragtime gal! Send me your kiss by wire, baby my heart's on fire! If you refuse me honey you'll lose me then you'll be left alone, oh baby telephone and tell me I'm your own!

[Dr. Schlotkin is caught making out with his nurse assistant]
Schlotkin!

[pulls away from the nurse and adjusts his glasses as the nurse nervously zips the top of her dress back up]
What?
We're done with you. Go back to the golf course and work on your putz.
A million? That's unfair.
Unfair to payor but not to payee. But you're gonna pay it, or else!
Or else what?
Tell him, Vinnie.
Or else Pizza is gonna send out for *you*!
Lone Star!
[camera moves in closer and closer during his dialog until it smashes into Dark Helmet and knocks him out]

[aboard Mega-Maid]
Thank you for pressing the self destruct button.
I am the keeper of a greater magic, a power known throughout the universe... as the...
...the Force?
No, the Schwartz!
I was saying; Do you realize what you've done?
Yes, and I'm glad. Glad, glad, glad, glad, glad.
I wonder if she's glad.
Hey, stop looking up my can.
Sorry.
Called me an idiot! I'm going back there and explain a few things to her.
Besides he got a sexy voice. He might be cute.
Wait. You haven't seen what she looks like.
I know what she looks like. You've seen one princess, you've seen them all.
Cute? I know these space bums, they're all alike. Fat, ugly...
Buck-toothed, knock-kneed...
Beer-swilling pigs!
Horse-faced space dogs!
[watching Spaceball One change into MegaMaid]
Oh, my gosh. It's not just a spaceship. It's a Transformer.
Hey wait, you forgot to get married!
I really must go back. I shouldn't have run away. I realize now that love is one luxury a princess cannot afford.
You're probably right.
I know now that I must learn to live without love.
I guess so.
Besides, love isn't that important.
Nah... It never was!
I could be perfectly happy the rest of my life without...
[turns and looks into Lone Starr's eyes, pauses]
love.
Sure you could.
Without physical contact.
Yeah.
Without being held.
Yeah.
Or kissed...
[they go to kiss, but right before they make contact, Dot Matrix's "Virgin Alarm" goes off]
Abandon ship! Abandon ship! Women and mogs first!

[looking up at the night sky]
Which one's yours?
Who knows?
You don't know where you're from?
Not really. I was found on the doorstep of a monastery.
A monastery? Where?
Somewhere in the Ford Galaxy.
...to join Princess Vespa and Prince Valium in the bonds of Holy...
[sound of Eagle 5 flying over the castle]
MOLY!
Ah, Planet Druidia, and ten thousand years of fresh air.

[aside to Colonel Sandurz]
The way he runs things, it won't last a hundred.

As president of Planet Spaceball, I can assure both you and your viewers that there's absolutely no air shortage whatsoever. Yes, of course. I've heard the same rumor myself. Yes, thanks for calling and not reversing the charges. Bye.
[hangs up]

[under his breath]
Shithead.

[Mega Maid is sucking the air away from Druidia]
What'll we do?
We've got to act fast. Step one, we reverse the vacuum and blow the air back onto the planet. Step two, we destroy that thing.
But isn't that dangerous?
Extremely. Plus, I don't know how the hell we're gonna do it!

[singing in a very deep tone]
Nobody knows...
It's coming from there.
That can't be her.
[Lone Starr and Barf walk toward the cell that the singing is coming from]

[singing in a very deep tone]
... the trouble I've seen...
[Lone Starr opens eye slot in jail cell door and sees Princess Vespa singing]

[singing in a very deep tone]
Nobody knows but Jesus.
It's her.

[Barf looks in - Princess Vespa still singing in a very deep tone]
Nobody knows the trouble I've seen.
She's a bass.

[after the chest-bursting alien dances across the counter at the diner]
Check please!
WHAT? You went over my helmet?
So, Lone Starr. Yogurt has taught you well. If there's one thing I despise, it is a fair fight. But if I must, then I must. May the best man win. Put 'er there.
[Reaches out to shake Lone Starr's hand and instead takes his Schwartz ring]
The Ring! I can't believe you fell for the oldest trick in the book! What a goof! What's with you man? Come on! You know what? Here let me give it back to you.
[throws it down the grate]
Oh, look, you fell for that too! I can't believe it, man!
All personnel proceed to escape pods. Close down the circus. Evacuate the zoo. The self-destruct mechanism has been activated. Abandon ship.
It's not that we're afraid, far from it, it's just that we've got this thing about death... It's not us!
I still don't understand how I'm going to lift that big statue with this little ring.
Never underestimate the power of the Schwartz!
Well, I hope it's a long ceremony, 'cause it's gonna be a short honeymoon.
Ah, planet Druidia. And under that air shield, ten thousand years of fresh air. We must get through that air shield!

[Summing up the evil plan of the movie]
We will, sir. Once we kidnap the princess, we can force her father, King Roland, to give us the combination to the air shild, thereby destroying Planet Druidia and saving Planet Spaceballs.

[to camera]
Everybody got that?
Good. When will the princess be married?
Within an hour, sir.
Well I hope it's a long ceremony, 'cause it's gonne be a short honeymoon.
[laughs "evil"]
Well, if it isn't Lone Star. And his sidekick, Puke.
That's Barf.
Barf... Puke... *Whatever!*
And may the Schwartz be with youuuyoyoy - oh what a world, what a world!
Yogurt! Yogurt! I hate Yogurt! Even with Strawberries.
Hey! I don't have to put up with this! I'm rich!

[sees Barf carrying a lot of luggage]
Checking in? What the hell is all that?

[unintelligable from the bag in his mouth]
Ith her oyal igness' atched uggage!
What?

[pulls the bag out of his mouth]
Her royal highness' matched luggage!
Matched luggage? What does she think this is, a princess cruise?
Well, what have we got here? Will you look at her? Those flashing eyes, those flushed cheeks, those trembling lips. You know something Princess? You are *ugly* when you're angry.
[first lines]
Colonel Sandurz!
What is it, Sergeant Ricco?
You told me to let you know the moment Planet Druidia was in sight, sir.
So?
Planet Druidia's in sight, sir.
You're really a Spaceball. You know that, don't you?
Thanks, sir.
What's going on?
It's either the 4th of July, or someone's trying to kill us!

[Flipping switches to beam President Skroob back]
Lock one... lock two... lock three... Loch Lomond...

[Dark Helmet and Lone Starr are fighting. As they are fighting, Dark Helmet takes a swing with his saber at L.S. L.S. ducks and Dark Helmet ends up cutting down a movie crewman. Both D.H and L.S. stare for a moment]
Ummmm... He did it.
What?
No, it's not what you think. It's much, much worse!
[Steps out of motorhome and flips off guards while making kissing sounds]
Helmet! So, at last we meet for the first time for the last time.
[Colonel Sandurz, Dark Helmet and the Video Operator are watching [link=tt0094012], the movie]
That's much too early. Prepare to fast-forward!
Preparing to fast-forward!
Fast-forward!
Fast-forwarding, sir!

[realizing that President Skroob's head is on backwards]
Geezbeasties! What's happened to his head?

[disgusted]
It's on backwards!
President Skroob! Salute!

[all do the spaceball salute]
Hail Skroob!
Snotty - beam him down.
Yes sir. Immediately, sir.

[after Spaceball 1 zooms past the Winnebago at 'ludicrous speed']
They must've overshot us by about a week!

[They hear a blowing sound]
Helmet, what's going on?
Sandurz, what's going on?
It's Megamaid sir, she gone from suck to blow.
Well we've got to stop it.
[to Helmet]
Do something!

[to Sandurz]
Do something!

[Over Intercom]
Do something!
[when Lone Star and Barf stops on the outer space gas-station]
Ready to order?
Ah, yes, we'll both have the lunafish.

[to Col. Sandurz]
Give me that, you petty excuse for an officer!
Ha, didn't even stay for the wedding. Just took his million spacebucks and ran.
He didn't take the million...
Hey, you can't park here!
Yeah, can't you read? No parking!
